thread.title: WWE Reportedly Makes Offer To Matt And Jeff Hardy
thread.title_full: WWE Reportedly Makes Offer To Matt And Jeff Hardy

title: WWE Reportedly Makes Offer To Matt And Jeff Hardy
text:
By Raj Giri | March 21, 2017 
WWE reportedly offered new contracts to Matt and Jeff Hardy, according to a report by Pro Wrestling Sheet . It was noted that "all signs point to an inevitable [WWE] return." See Also Reby Hardy Says Impact Wrestling Is Suing The Hardys, Tried To Come After Her Father 
The Hardys, who are currently working with Ring Of Honor on a short-term deal, are currently in a legal battle with Impact Wrestling regarding the likeness to their "Broken" gimmick. Impact Wrestling reportedly wants a percentage of any deal that the Hardys make using the likeness, which was the brainchild of Matt Hardy, although it first debuted on Impact television. 
Charles Maynard contributed to this article. Follow Raj Giri on Twitter at @RajGiri_303 . Got a news tip or correction? Send it to us by clicking here . Related Articles
